sentences.en: Defrost the fridge regularly so that it works at maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 定期给冰箱除霜，以便它能发挥其最高效率。

sentences.en: Efficiency will be multiplied several times.
Friction lowers the efficiency of a machine.
He managed the factory with unobtrusive efficiency.
sentences.cn: 他经营那家工厂很有效率却不事张扬。

sentences.en: If we forge ahead continuously without a break, we'll be able to raise efficiency.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不停顿地继续前进, 我们就能提高效率.

sentences.en: improvements in efficiency at the factory
Introduction of electronic point-of-sale systems is improving efficiency.
sentences.cn: 引进销售点电子系统提高了效率。

sentences.en: It doesn't take much to improve the energy efficiency of your home.
sentences.cn: 改善家庭能耗并非难事。

sentences.en: It was Mann who structured the agenda for maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 是曼制定这个取得最大效率的议程的.

sentences.en: Revenues from "green taxes" could then be channelled back into energy efficiency.
sentences.cn: 从“绿色税收”得来的收入便可回过头来用于提高能效。

sentences.en: Some of Martha's efficiency has rubbed off on you.
sentences.cn: 玛莎工作效率高,你也受到了一些影响.

sentences.en: The spa is the last word in luxury and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 这家矿泉疗养浴场极尽奢华，功效极高。

sentences.en: We can make big savings on fuel through greater efficiency.
sentences.cn: 我们可通过提高效率大量节省燃料.

sentences.en: We were most impressed with your efficiency.
sentences.cn: 你的效率给我们留下很深刻的印象.

sentences.en: When Johnson talks about cuts, he uses words like "target price" and "efficiency payments".
sentences.cn: 约翰逊谈起降价时，会使用“目标价位”和“效率支付”之类的字眼。

words.tran_cn: 有效率的；有能力的；生效的
有效地；效率高地（efficient的副词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 驱替效率；置换效率；洗油效率
经济效率，经济效果；经济有效
营业效率，经营效率；工作效率
转换效率；传输效率；合金过渡系数
工作效率；劳动效率；加工效率

trans.tran_en: the quality of doing something well and effectively, without wasting time, money, or energy
